javadoc:
Base JFrame to be used by the root window and detached windows if they are using frames Also fixed:
  1. Swing problem of setting bounds before the frame is visible causes slow paints if the bounds position is not on the primary display,
name: DockingFrame
comment:
Base JFrame to be used by the root window and detached windows if they are using frames

 Also fixed:
 
  Swing problem of setting bounds before the frame is visible causes slow paints
 	if the bounds position is not on the primary display,
